title: Ravens-Cardinals questions, QB Pressure, NFL Top 100 update, and Will Kenny Pickett start?
itunes:title: Ravens-Cardinals questions, QB Pressure, NFL Top 100 update, and Will Kenny Pickett start?
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Ravens preseason winning streak continuing against the Cardinals.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty and Tom Pelissero move onto discuss which QBs have the most pressure on them going into the season.  We look at the latest release in the NFL Top 100, Kyle and Tom are surprised at the first time entry points for Joe Burrow and Matthew Stafford.  The table debates the odds that Kenny Pickett will get the opportunity to start for the Steelers before we wrap up with a special award for Jamie.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
